type.name: custom
custom

design.description: the specified design, `slats` is special cased

index.description: index of this specific pivot relative to total set

xsSubtitles.description: if subtitles should render on mobile

selected.description: whether this tile/slat is currently selected

disabled.description: whether this tile/slat is rendered in disabled state

id.description: An optional unique id attribute for the element

arrow.description: adds a specific class to change the way a pivot looks
